# 

![](https://komarev.com/ghpvc/?username=itishprasad30&color=blue&style=plastic)
<br>
![Itish's GitHub stats](https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api?username=itishprasad30&show_icons=true&theme=tokyonight)


Hey there, welcome!  
I'm Itish Prasad Sahoo, Front End developer from  **Cuttack, India**.

üí°  I like to explore new trends and learn new technologies.  
üå±  I'm on track for learning more about  [React](https://reactjs.org/),  [Redux](https://redux.js.org/)  and  [NextJS](https://nextjs.org/).  
üöß  I'm currently working on a small front-end project  üëÄ.  
‚ö° Fun fact: while i coding i like to listen Music.
üí¨  Feel free to reach out to me for consulting, volunteering or just for some interesting discussion.
